meaning_str.bing:
n. 政治；政见；权术；政治事务（或活动）
网络. 政治学；时政；政纲

政治；政见；权术；政治事务（或活动）

政治；政治事务；（个人的）政治观点；政策；政见；党派斗争；钩心斗角；政治手腕；政治操作
<贬>参与政治活动；从事政治工作；（politic的第三人称单数）

1.en: All politics seems to be local in Mr Harper's book, even if the action takes place on the other side of the world.
1.cn: 在哈珀的书本里，所有权术似乎都是褊狭的，即使他的行动是在世界的另一边展开。

2.en: After forty years in politics he thinks it's time to call it a day.
2.cn: 他从政四十年，认为该结束了。

3.en: He gave up politics when he might have made a great career in it.
3.cn: 他放弃了政治活动，本来他在这方面是大有作为的。

0.en: Politics isn't really my area of expertise. Really?
0.cn: 我对政治可不感冒。是么？

1.en: Anything interesting? I'm reading about County Politics.
1.cn: 有什么好玩的吗？我在看郡时事政治。

2.en: But what are my politics these days? I'm not sure.
2.cn: 可我现在的政治理念是什么？我自己都不清楚了。

3.en: I never get involved in politics. You'd best be on your way.
3.cn: 我从不卷入政治，你最好继续走你的路。

4.en: Even if that were the case, the politics work in my favor too.
4.cn: 即使是这样，这在政治上对我也有好处。

5.en: We can announce together. That takes the politics out of this.
5.cn: 我们可以一起宣布，这样其中的政治味就没那么浓了。

6.en: They've gone to a whole lot of trouble to make me look pretty bad. But that's politics.
6.cn: 他们为玷污我的形象真是煞费苦心。但这就是政治

7.en: This debate deserves more than politics as usual It's important for our future.
7.cn: 对移民问题的辩论应该比平常的政治辩论更多这对我们的未来很重要。

8.en: Without the politics and bureaucracy, that undermine the integrity of government run spy organizations.
8.cn: 没有政治和官僚主义，专门瓦解政府手下的间谍组织。

9.en: United they stand. A union like none other. The unsplittable atom of American politics.
9.cn: 他们站在一起，独一无二的联盟，成为美国政治中的不可分裂原子。

10.en: Well, that's politics. It's different. You take money wherever you can get it. No, this was our first home.
10.cn: 那是政治，不一样。筹钱要上天入地。这是我们第一个家。

11.en: We have to understand that this a paradigm shift. We have to start thinking beyond politics.
11.cn: 我们必须明白这是种模式的转变，我们必须开始考虑超越政治范畴的问题了。

12.en: A solution that's elegant as hell. But then there's no elegance in modern politics. It's mostly hell.
12.cn: 这办法简洁得见了鬼。过现代政治哪有什么简洁可言。只剩下见鬼了。

13.en: At the Peak Tower, meet some of the giants of history, politics, and popular culture at Madam Tussauds.
13.cn: 在太平山凌霄阁中，您会在杜莎夫人蜡像馆中看见很多历史、政治和流行文化名人。

14.en: The issues the governor and the general raise are important ones. They transcend party affiliations and, quite frankly, politics.
14.cn: 州长和将军指出的问题都非常重要，这超越两党分歧，甚至超越政治。

15.en: Well, I'll make a statement and blame it on the politics of personal destruction. No, Doug, I'm afraid that's just not going to be enough.
15.cn: 我会发表声明说这是人身攻击式的政治手段。不，道格，恐怕这些仍不够。

16.en: You're saying you didn't blackmail them? I pressure a lot of people, Tom. That's part of politics. But never those two.
16.cn: 你是说你没胁迫过他们？我曾对许多人施压，汤姆，这是政治的一部分，但从没威胁过他们。

17.en: But, you see, in politics, stature is everything. And wouldn't you say that Willy C is getting shorter by the minute?
17.cn: 但你看，在政治中身高[声望]决定一切。你也能看出来小威·康每分钟都在变矮[底气不足]？

18.en: I congratulate you, brother, on a fine accord. You are now proven in battle and politics. Warrior and diplomat.
18.cn: 祝贺你，兄弟，你达成了利于我们的协议，你在战争和政治中都证明了自己，你既是勇士，又是外交家。

19.en: But while our politics may be divided at times, the American people stand united around supporting our troops and their families.
19.cn: 但尽管我们的政治意见可能不时面临分歧，美国人民始终与我们的部队和军属们站在一起。
